alert.message: This alert fires when one or more electric switches failed to answer a "call-for-heat" from one or more thermostatic radiator valves. When any valve has a non-zero output, at least one electric switch is expected to be ON (i.e. the central boiler)
alert.name: Call for heat: Switching on alert

panels.description: When one or more valves are calling for heat, there must be at least one switch calling for heat (i.e. the boiler switch)
panels.title: Call for heat: Switching on

alert.message: This alert fires when one or more electric switches failed to become OFF after all thermostatic radiator valves set their output to 0%.
alert.name: Call for heat: Switching off alert

panels.description: When no valves are calling for heat, there must be any switch calling for heat (i.e. the boiler switch)
panels.title: Call for heat: Switching off

alert.message: This alert fires when one or more devices report a battery low battery voltage <2.45V.
alert.name: Low battery alert

alert.message: This alert fires when one or more devices have not sent a status update in the last 6h.
alert.name: Stale status
